ygData.messageBody:
I just don't think they'd ever give us that. It's kind of the Diablo
syndrom. They let us go into auto attack, but somehow didn't like the idea
of players just hitting a key and sitting back and relaxing while they
watched a battle. Notice -every- class is doing something during a fight.
Even warrior types are bashing/kicking/taunting, and do not envy the clerics
who must stop targeting a mob, target the player in need, heal, retarget the
mob. Just be thankful you don't have to click every time you swing, because
if we didn't have other things to do in battle, it's a safe bet we'd be
doing that!

Roop
